parameters.userPrompt: Extract new leads from this CRM dashboard. Focus on lead information, contact details, and source data. Use this schema for response: { "request_id": "unique_id", "status": "completed", "platform": "CRM System", "leads": [{ "lead_id": "LEAD-12345", "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Smith", "email": "john@company.com", "phone": "+1-555-0123", "company_name": "Acme Corp", "job_title": "Marketing Director", "lead_source": "Website Form", "campaign_source": "Google Ads", "lead_score": null, "status": "New", "created_date": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z", "last_activity": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z", "industry": null, "company_size": null, "annual_revenue": null, "website": "https://acmecorp.com", "linkedin_profile": null, "notes": "Interested in enterprise solution", "tags": ["enterprise", "marketing"], "assigned_sales_rep": null, "priority": "Medium" }] }

Extract detailed company information from this LinkedIn company page for sales intelligence. Focus on company size, industry, recent news, and key personnel. Use this schema: { "request_id": "unique_id", "status": "completed", "platform": "LinkedIn", "company_data": { "company_name": "Acme Corp", "industry": "Technology", "company_size": "201-500 employees", "headquarters": "San Francisco, CA", "founded": "2010", "website": "https://acmecorp.com", "description": "Leading provider of innovative solutions", "specialties": ["Software", "AI", "Machine Learning"], "recent_posts": [{ "title": "Company expansion announcement", "date": "2024-01-10T00:00:00Z", "engagement": 125 }], "key_personnel": [{ "name": "Jane CEO", "title": "Chief Executive Officer", "linkedin_url": "https://linkedin.com/in/janeceo" }], "company_updates": ["Recently raised Series B funding", "Expanding to European market"], "tech_stack": ["Salesforce", "HubSpot", "Slack"], "competitors": ["Competitor1", "Competitor2"] } }

Extract funding and financial information from this Crunchbase company profile for lead qualification. Use this schema: { "request_id": "unique_id", "status": "completed", "platform": "Crunchbase", "financial_data": { "company_name": "Acme Corp", "total_funding": "$50M", "last_funding_round": "Series B", "last_funding_date": "2023-06-15T00:00:00Z", "funding_amount": "$25M", "valuation": "$200M", "investors": ["VC Fund 1", "Angel Investor"], "employee_count": 350, "growth_stage": "Growth", "revenue_estimate": "$10M-50M", "funding_history": [{ "round": "Series A", "amount": "$10M", "date": "2021-03-01" }], "acquisition_history": [], "ipo_status": "Private", "contact_info": { "email": "contact@acmecorp.com", "phone": "+1-555-ACME" } } }

parameters.message:
={{ '

Welcome ' + $json.first_name + '!

Thank you for your interest in our solutions. Based on your profile at ' + $json.company_name + ', we believe we can help you achieve your goals.

Next Steps:

    ' + $json.sales_actions.immediate_actions.map(action => '
  • ' + action + '
    • ').join('') + '

We look forward to connecting with you!

' }}
parameters.subject: ={{ 'Welcome ' + $json.first_name + ' - Next Steps for ' + $json.company_name }}

parameters.text:
={{ '🚨 NEW HIGH-VALUE LEAD: ' + $json.first_name + ' ' + $json.last_name + ' from ' + $json.company_name + '
📊 Lead Score: ' + $json.lead_score + ' (' + $json.qualification.grade + ')
🎯 Category: ' + $json.qualification.category + '
💰 Estimated Value: ' + ($json.enriched_data.financial.revenue_estimate || 'Unknown') + '
👤 Assigned to: ' + $json.sales_actions.sales_rep_assignment + '
⚡ Priority: ' + $json.qualification.priority }}

parameters.content:
# 🎯 Sales Pipeline Automation Overview

This comprehensive workflow automates the entire lead processing pipeline from initial capture to CRM integration and team notifications.

## Key Components
1. **Dual Trigger System** - Scheduled monitoring + real-time webhooks
2. **AI-Powered Data Enrichment** - LinkedIn & Crunchbase integration
3. **Advanced Lead Scoring** - 0-100 point algorithm with multiple factors
4. **Smart Routing & CRM Integration** - Automated contact/deal creation
5. **Intelligent Follow-up** - Personalized email sequences
6. **Team Collaboration** - Slack notifications & task assignment
7. **Analytics & Reporting** - Google Sheets dashboard

## Benefits
- 90% reduction in manual lead processing time
- Consistent lead qualification across all sources
- Immediate response to high-value prospects
- Complete audit trail and performance analytics

# ⏱️ Automated Lead Monitoring

Dual trigger system ensures no leads are missed:

## Schedule Trigger
- **Frequency**: Every 2 hours (configurable)
- **Purpose**: Systematic CRM scanning for new leads
- **Best for**: Batch processing and backup monitoring

## Webhook Trigger
- **Type**: Real-time HTTP POST endpoint
- **Purpose**: Instant processing of new lead notifications
- **Best for**: Immediate response to high-priority leads

## Configuration Tips
- Set schedule frequency based on lead volume
- Monitor webhook reliability and add fallback logic
- Use different time zones if operating globally
- Test both triggers regularly to ensure reliability

# 🤖 AI-Powered Data Extraction

ScrapeGraph AI intelligently extracts structured lead data from your CRM dashboard using natural language processing.

## How It Works
- **Input**: CRM dashboard URL with new leads
- **Processing**: AI analyzes page content and extracts relevant data
- **Output**: Structured JSON with lead information

## Key Features
- Natural language prompts for data extraction
- Handles dynamic web content and JavaScript
- Flexible schema definition for custom fields
- Error handling for missing or malformed data

## Configuration
- Update the website URL to match your CRM
- Customize the extraction schema for your data fields
- Add ScrapeGraph AI API credentials
- Test with sample pages to verify extraction accuracy

# 🏢 Company Intelligence Enrichment

Automatically enriches lead data with comprehensive company information from LinkedIn and financial data from Crunchbase.

## LinkedIn Enrichment
- Company size and industry classification
- Recent news and company updates
- Key personnel and decision makers
- Technology stack and competitive landscape
- Social media activity and engagement metrics

## Crunchbase Financial Data
- Funding rounds and total investment
- Company valuation and growth stage
- Investor information and partnerships
- Revenue estimates and employee count
- Acquisition history and IPO status

## Benefits
- Enhanced lead qualification accuracy
- Better sales rep assignment decisions
- Personalized outreach opportunities
- Risk assessment through red flag detection

# 🧠 Advanced Lead Scoring Algorithm

Sophisticated JavaScript processor that calculates lead scores based on multiple weighted factors.

## Scoring Factors (0-100 points)
- **Company Size**: 10-100 points based on employee count
- **Industry Fit**: 20-95 points for target industry alignment
- **Funding Stage**: 30-95 points based on investment rounds
- **Lead Source**: 20-90 points for source quality (demo > referral > form)
- **Job Title**: 25-95 points for decision-making authority
- **Engagement Signals**: 0-50 points for intent indicators
- **Company Traction**: 0-35 points for growth signals

## Lead Grading System
- **A+ (85-100)**: Enterprise priority, immediate follow-up
- **A (75-84)**: High-value leads, priority sequence
- **B+ (65-74)**: Qualified prospects, standard process
- **B (55-64)**: Good prospects, nurture sequence
- **C+ (45-54)**: Marginal leads, long-term nurture
- **C (0-44)**: Low priority, minimal follow-up

## Automation Triggers
- **90+ Score**: Same-day personal outreach
- **85+ Score**: Enterprise AE assignment
- **70+ Score**: Priority follow-up sequence

# 🔀 Smart Lead Routing

Intelligent conditional logic routes qualified leads through automated action sequences based on their scores and categories.

## Routing Logic
- **Enterprise (85+)**: Critical priority path
- **High-Value (70-84)**: Expedited processing
- **Qualified (50-69)**: Standard workflow
- **Below 50**: Filtered out or nurture sequence

## Quality Gates
- Red flag detection prevents low-quality leads
- Opportunity indicators boost lead priority
- Fit assessment validates ideal customer profile
- Multiple validation checks ensure data quality

## Benefits
- Prevents sales team overload with low-quality leads
- Ensures high-value prospects get immediate attention
- Maintains consistent lead qualification standards
- Optimizes sales rep time allocation

# 💼 CRM Integration & Automation

Seamlessly integrates with HubSpot CRM to create enriched contact records and sales opportunities.

## Contact Creation
- Complete lead profile with enriched data
- Custom fields for scoring and intelligence
- Automatic lead source and campaign attribution
- Sales rep assignment based on lead category

## Deal Generation
- Automatic opportunity creation with estimated value
- Deal stage set to qualification phase
- Priority and category tags for pipeline management
- 90-day close date estimation

## Task Management
- Automated follow-up task creation
- Priority assignment based on lead score
- Detailed task descriptions with action items
- Sales rep assignment and due date scheduling

## Email Automation
- Personalized welcome emails with dynamic content
- Template selection based on lead category
- Immediate actions and next steps included
- Professional formatting with company branding

# 🔔 Team Collaboration & Analytics

Real-time notifications and comprehensive reporting keep the entire sales team informed and aligned.

## Slack Integration
- Instant notifications for high-value leads
- Lead score, category, and assignment details
- Estimated deal value and priority indicators
- Direct links to CRM records for quick access

## Analytics Dashboard
- Google Sheets integration for comprehensive reporting
- Lead scoring trends and conversion metrics
- Sales rep performance and assignment tracking
- Red flag analysis and opportunity indicators
- Historical data for trend analysis

## Reporting Features
- Real-time lead processing logs
- Performance metrics by source and category
- Scoring distribution and qualification rates
- Follow-up completion and conversion tracking

## Benefits
- Complete visibility into lead pipeline
- Data-driven sales process optimization
- Team accountability and performance tracking
- Historical analysis for continuous improvement

# ⚙️ Configuration Requirements

## Required API Credentials
- **ScrapeGraph AI**: API key for web scraping
- **HubSpot**: OAuth2 for CRM integration
- **Email Service**: SMTP or service provider credentials
- **Slack**: Bot token for team notifications
- **Google Sheets**: OAuth2 for analytics dashboard

## URL Configuration
- Update CRM dashboard URLs to match your system
- Configure webhook endpoints for real-time triggers
- Set LinkedIn company page URL patterns
- Configure Crunchbase organization URLs

## Customization Options
- Modify lead scoring weights in processor code
- Adjust automation thresholds for different priorities
- Customize email templates and follow-up sequences
- Configure sales rep assignment rules

## Testing Checklist
- Verify all API connections and credentials
- Test webhook endpoints with sample data
- Validate data extraction schemas
- Check CRM field mappings and custom properties
- Test email delivery and Slack notifications

_metadata.name: Automate Sales Pipeline with HubSpot CRM, ScrapeGraphAI & Google Sheets Dashboard
